title: 菊花賞の後に・勝者となり、次の憧れへ

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha, haa, haa...!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I did it, I got it, I caught it...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yessssss~~~!!
(Waaaaaaaah――!)

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Matikanetannhauser,
I never thought she was such an amazing girl!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
She was a bit of a topic after the 'Japanese Derby'!
She's positive and has a friendly personality.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
She doesn't have overwhelming talent or anything,
but she's a strong girl who never gives up and keeps trying.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Never gives up and keeps trying... I see.

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text:
—Um, excuse me!
Could I interview you a bit about how you're feeling now?

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text:
Especially about,
Matikanetannhauser-san's part!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh, nice, nice.
Let Tannhauser's goodness spread.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
That girl really delivers when it counts.
...Hehe, just saying.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Alright, let's head back and run soon!
I gotta work hard too!

As I walk down the underground path to pick up Matikanetannhauser...
I hear faint voices talking.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: —I just really wanted to say thank you.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Today, I was really able to give it my all!
I could challenge as the number one Rice...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
That's... I think it's thanks to
Bourbon-san, after all.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
So... so...
thank you...!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...I feel the same way.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh...?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: To escape from you chasing me, I've become several times stronger than before.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...I'll be counting on you in the senior division as well.
The two, having praised each other, returned to the waiting room together in good spirits. Watching their backs as they left—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: With this, it feels like the Classic division arc is over, huh.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm home! We won, Trainer, yay!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But... let's save the celebrating for later, I have a little proposal—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I was thinking about what I want to challenge next now that the Classic Triple Crown is over!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Do you remember what the Chairman said during the summer training camp?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Things like 'It's not because I'm drawn to your record' or 'It's precisely because you're ordinary that you're appealing'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It makes me really happy, but honestly, there are parts I can't quite accept?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because normally, someone who can push you forward is strong, cool, and sparkling, right?
choice_data_list: That might be the general idea

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Right?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm happy about the expectations and want to meet them, but the more I think about it, the less I know how to respond~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, for now, I think I'll just go in the direction my heart desires!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And the one that really got me fired up is, straight up, the 'Tenno Sho (Spring)'...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I know, it won't be easy! It's a 3200m GⅠ long-distance race, the one that decides the strongest stayer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The tactics are sure to be much more difficult, and my stamina probably still isn't enough.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But still, winning on that big stage in spring... it's something to aspire to, isn't it...!
As always, she's probably unaware of it herself, but it's a very positive opinion.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, it's not exactly a prelude for that, but I'd like to fit in one long-distance race before spring.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: For example, something like the 'Diamond Stakes' at 3400m or so!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...What do you think?
There's no particular reason to refuse. In fact, if it's her wish, I'd like to grant it as much as possible. So—
choice_data_list: Got it, let's go for the 'Diamond S' next

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright... I'll do my best, do my best, I'll do my best~~!
And so, it's decided that the next challenge will be the long-distance GIII race 'Diamond S'!
